faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your inquiries about our Video Analytics feature

items.title: What kind of analytics does WaveSpeed provide?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI offers a range of analytics, including viewer retention rates, engagement metrics, key moment extraction, and highlight generation to help you understand video performance better.

items.title: Is it free to analyze my videos?
items.description: Yes! Each user gets daily access to essential analytics for up to 30 video uploads. For higher analysis needs, we offer subscription plans with enhanced features.

items.title: Can I use the analytics for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes, users with any subscription plan can utilize analytics insights for commercial projects. Free-tier users can access analytics for personal use.

items.title: How is my data protected?
items.description: WaveSpeed ensures all video uploads are processed in-browser without storage, guaranteeing your videos remain private and secure.

footer.heading: Ready to Unlock Video Insights?
